It is having 68 spacious rooms including 2 executive deluxe rooms, 24hours Coffee Shop & Multi cuisine Restaurant – Café Bloom & a banqueting facility for up to 200 persons. Hotel Nami Residency offers smart, contemporary, and top-of-the-line services & facilities.

name: Lemon Tree Premier; The Atrium, Ahmedabad
hotel_class_attribution: This property is classified according to Giata.
description: On the bank of Sabarmati, overlooking the riverfront, lounges this plush and stylish hotel, enhanced by landscaped greens and a serene water body. Large glass doors invitingly usher you into this classic boutique hotel with an atrium lobby dressed in soft leather and remarkable modern art. Contemporary and inviting, the lobby adorns an elegant look accentuated by a large pristine crystal chandelier, two stylish capsule elevators and several seating areas making it a perfect setting for private meetings and idle conversations. The hotel is designed to attract the millennium traveler with its 63 spacious and well appointed rooms and suites, a 24x7 multi-cuisine coffee shop– Citrus Café, with an interactive kitchen, and The Riverfront Grill, a picturesque alfresco grill and barbeque restaurant, which directly overlooks the Sabarmati river; besides a fully equipped gym and the largest indoor swimming pool in the city. Wake up to the picturesque view of the river from most rooms, trot at the joggers trail for a healthy start, enjoy sunrise over a hearty breakfast or end the day taking a leisurely walk by the riverside. To kindle travelers’ business ideas on the go, the hotel also offers fully equipped large conference rooms, exquisite board rooms, a business center along with a rooftop outdoor terrace to add that extra zing, to your special events. Together with its personalized services, modern facilities and impeccable service standards, this hotel is a perfect place for the upbeat business and leisure traveler to interact and unwind. The hotel is just 15 minutes from the railway station and 20 minutes from Sardar Vallabhbhai Patel International Airport. It is also in close proximity to major tourist attractions like the Gandhi Ashram as well as the shopping and commercial areas of CG Road in Navrangpura.

name: WelcomHeritage Mani Mansion
hotel_class_attribution: This property is classified according to Giata.
description: Mani Mansion previously knowns as "CORPORATE SUITES" was born out of a vision to preserve the rich cultural heritage associated to the ancestral home of the Dalal family. From an ancestral haveli, the owners have suitably modified the property to evolve into one of the city's finest heritage hotels. Situated in the heart of the city, the grand haveli turned Heritage Hotel offers a serene ambience that allows every traveler to enjoy a comfortable home stay. With an array of rooms tastefully furnished to match the urbane demands of today's traveler, we at Mani Mansion take extra care to address all your needs for a comfortable staying experience. A first of its kind concept, the premises consists of 21 different Suites that come packed with unique features like a mini kitchenette to a complimentary Wi-Fi usage for all the guests. In spite of these urbane facilities, we guarantee all our guests personalized attention and a unique stay that equates to a home away from a home impression. But apart from these many facilities that will ensure your comfortable stay, we at Mani Mansion, offer you a unique opportunity to come and experience the grandeur of a heritage property. From a 25 feet ceiling and architecture that clearly speaks volume about the rich lineage of culture associated with the city of Ahmedabad to 70 year old fans, uniqueness is inherent in every feature at Mani Mansion. Staying at Mani Mansion keeps you away from the regular hustle-bustle in spite of being in the heart of the city. In fact, Mani Mansion has also received heritage property stature from the Govt. of Gujarat. We invite you to be a part of this exclusive experience by staying with us and enjoying the beauty and grandeur of one of Amdavad's finest properties.

name: Riverview Hotel
description: Located in Ahmedabad’s downtown commercial area of Nehru Bridge, Ashram Road, on the banks of River Sabarmati, Always Hotel Riverview is a modern & contemporary 3 Star Hotel in the country’s fastest growing city. Well appointed, spacious rooms with parquet flooring & all modern amenities, it is ideal for both business & leisure traveler.Plan your next luxury stay at the Riverview Hotel is one of the best hotel in Ahmedabad near sabarmati riverfront, which is the perfect destination for budget stay in Ahmedabad. Riverview hotel is located near Ashram Road Ahmedabad

name: Four Points by Sheraton Ahmedabad
hotel_class_attribution: This property is classified according to Giata.

mobile.headline: Christmas Staycation

description: Description: Get what you’re looking for with the style and service you want, all at a great price. We have what matters most to you, like a comfortable bed, a delicious breakfast and fresh coffee. You will also find high speed internet access, and delicious, simple food. Four Points by Sheraton Ahmedabad has a great location in the heart of the city. We are just 10km from Ahmedabad airport, 3km from the railway station and 1.5km from Paldi bus station. Shopping is just minutes away from our door. Our well-equipped meeting rooms and pre-function area totals 288 square meters. Let our team of dedicated professionals work with you to host your special event. Whether you are in town for business or leisure, convenience, comfort and value are everywhere at Four Points by Sheraton Ahmedabad.
